name: Turret Gauntlet
description:
Try to dodge and shoot your way through rooms of turrets and become more powerful every time you complete a level. Made for the 7-Day FPS Jam. 

If you complete a level, you can increase either your damage, fire rate, or even add additional bullets to be fired (burst-fire). This means with consecutive levels you can  create a ridiculous, high damage, bullet hose to fire at your enemies. However, the damage of the turrets increases slightly every level as well. So as you become more powerful, you also become more fragile.

This game makes procedurally generated levels of custom-made level pieces.  I designed the rooms, hallways, and turret placement for each room. The game decides what rooms and corridors make up a level as well as which turret goes in what spot. 

WASD to move and Left Click to shoot. You can also sprint with Shift and wallrun for some added dodging mobility.
